title: Photo Session
noPhotosYet: No photos uploaded yet. Be the first to share a moment!

errors.sessionNotFoundDescription: The session you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed.
errors.noPhotoData: No photo or session data available
errors.emptyPhoto: Photo file is empty. Please retake the photo.
errors.corruptedPhoto: Photo file appears to be corrupted. Please retake the photo.
errors.downloadUnauthorized: You can only download photos from your own sessions.
errors.downloadFailed: Failed to download photos. Please try again.
errors.title: Session Error

status.expiredDescription: This session has expired and is no longer accepting photos.
status.limitDescription: You have uploaded your maximum of {{limit}} photos. Thank you for sharing your moments!
status.othersCanUpload: Other users can still upload their photos to this session.

camera.pcDescription: Simple and reliable camera for desktop

actions.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this photo? This action cannot be undone.

upload.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop photos here, or click to select
upload.uploadError: Failed to upload some photos. Please try again.

limits.limitReached: You have reached your photo limit ({{limit}} photos)

qr.title: Your QR Code is Ready
qr.description: Share this QR code with your guests to start collecting photos

gallery.clickToView: Click any photo to view full size

info.shareDescription: Share the QR code or link below with your guests to start collecting photos from your event.
info.uploadLimit: They can upload up to {{limit}} photos each to your session.
info.viewDescription: You can view and download all photos from your dashboard or session page.
